content:
Sure! Here are some suggestions on how to choose people to challenge:

1. Pick people in your niche: Choose other YouTubers or influencers who share similar interests or content as you. This will make the challenge more relevant and relatable for your audience.

2. Find people with a similar following: Choose other YouTubers or influencers who have a similar number of followers as you. This will create a fair competition and give you a chance to gain exposure to new audiences.

3. Choose people with an engaged following: Look for YouTubers or influencers who have an engaged following who will appreciate the challenge and be excited to participate.

4. Explore outside your niche: If you want to add a bit of a twist to the challenge, choose someone from a completely different niche. This will make the challenge more interesting and exciting for your viewers.

Remember, the key is to choose people who are willing to take part in the challenge, and who will also help promote your video. By picking the right people to challenge, you can create a fun and engaging video that resonates with your audience.
